name: cement, all types to generic market for cement, unspecified | cement, unspecified | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/19458/documentation

This is a linking (transfering) activity which links the specific cement to the generic market for cement, unspecified.

The activity starts with the reception of a specific cement.

The activity ends with cement, unspecified which is supplied to the generic market for cement, unspecified.
category: C:Manufacturing/23:Manufacture of other non-metallic mineral products/239:Manufacture of non-metallic mineral products n.e.c./2394:Manufacture of cement, lime and plaster

processDocumentation.timeDescription: The shares of the cements, as well as the production volume, are for the year 2021.
processDocumentation.geographyDescription: This dataset represents production of 'cement, unspecified' for Switzerland.
processDocumentation.samplingDescription: Shares of cement delivery by type from cemsuisse figures 2021, where the 4,9% of the category "others" can be considered to be CEM II/B according to cemsuisse personal communication. Source: cemsuisse (2022), Jahresbericht cemsuisse, page 9. Available at: https://www.cemsuisse.ch/jahresberichte/, accessed on 20.06.2023.
